My Dead By Daylight Review

Review: I have been playing this game for an hour now and I gotta say I've been having fun playing this game so far I have not occured any problems at all, I have been seeing people saying that when connecting to game server's it takes forever to join or they can't get in at All I suppose they fixed that because I've been killer twice and survivor once and I got in a game in under 10 second's no problem at all. It might have been the new update or something but it's been really great I highly recommend this game to anyone but 10 time's better if you are playing with friends.

[PROS]
>Run's good on a decent PC
>Survivor's and Killer's Are Extreamly fair
>Quick to get into match
>Free Update's So Far
>Haven't had a single problem so far
>Best played with friend's

[CONS]
>I really don't got none I have REALLY thought about this one trying to think of something I didn't like but there are none.

Sziasztok! Szóóóval.. Hol is kezdjem? Szeretnék egy igényes véleményt írni, hogy tudjak segíteni eldönteni nektek kell-e a játék vagy sem. Ehhez hasonló játékot még nem nagyon találtam. Van 4  játékos akik menekülnek és 1 gyilkos. A menekülők célja a generátorok megjavítása és azután a kijutás. Ezt lehet egyedül, de könnyebb együtt összetartva. Amikor belépsz az első meccsbe és majd összeszarod magad annyira félsz.. az nagyon vicces. Nem tudod mit kezdj magaddal aztán persze belejössz. Fontos a csapatjáték, de NEM kötelező. Ezt úgy értem, hogy mikor a kapu már nyitva és szabad az út a nyalókaföldre én még akkor is visszafutok a kampón nyaraló társamért. Ez nem mindig hasznos mert 50-50 hogy túléled. Nem akarok általánosítani, de 50-50 hogy neked segíteni fognak. Ez egy picit rossz. Vagy mikor megcsinálsz az 5-ből 4 generátort és azon gondolkozol ez most multi vagy single. Persze single nincs. Az előző pár napban párszor crash-el kidobált, de már javították is. Most komolyan. Melyik játékban nincs bug? Vagy bármi. Kicsivel több mint 2 hónapja jött ki és vannak hibái. Ez igaz, de Kifogják javítani és hibátlan lesz. Már beraktak egy új csúcsszuper és egyben nagyon félelmetes pályát, egy új gyilkost és még egy új karaktert is. Az első meccsen konkrétan remegtem és imádkoztam a játéknak, hogy ne kelljen gatyót cserélnem. Tényleg csúcs szuper. Olyan atmoszférája van.. jó pár horror game elbújhat. Összegezve, mert már sokat beszélek. Ajánlom ezt a játékot nagyon is! Vegyétek meg! Próbáljátok ki! Ne az első pár óra vagy a rossz élmény határozzon meg mindent. Ha beletanul az ember akár egyedül is hozhat egy meccset. Bár erre nagyon kicsi az esély, hogy ennyire hasznavehetetlen felebarátokat kap az ember. Nagyon izgalmas és egyben félelmetes. Szuper adrenalin bomba az unalmas napokon. Ha szeretnétek egy kis izgalmat, és megtapasztalni milyen rettegve az életetekért küzdeni akkor mindenképpen kötelező beszerezni és kerüljétek a kampókat! :)

Honestly this game deserves Much more praise. the whole feeling to the game is amazing and the soundtrack is so thematic and really puts you on edge. The gameplay is nearly solid with a few screw ups. such as range of weapons (for example getting hit while already vaulted away from a window and was a step away from the opening) thats about it.
Pros!
-great soundtrack
-Very VERY fun with friends
-the character design is wonderful. The killers have this nice familiar but original feel to them. 
-Map design is IN my opinion great!
-the perks and addons for each character cand really help you out at times!
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Cons!
-Rarely you are randomly kicked out of a match with no reason told
-Nurse is just annoying not really a bad con (It can be avoided easily if your a regular to dodging the hunnies)
-it would actually be cool to have some seperate lobby music. something similar to what it is now. but i like the song so much i dont want to hear it over and over again and get bored. (but it does have a very long runtime and has awesome sounding parts, so its not just an annoying short loop.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The game is a very fun game to me and i dont think it deserves all this hate!
sure the matchmaking connectivity can be a little annoying. but its just because its free weekend currently. and its pairing you with squads of survivors who can be people in 3s looking for 1 more person or a squad of 2 looking for 2 more. just a player group complaint and i cant say thats a bad game bug or design. its mostly player complaint.
I HIGHLY RECCOMEND THIS GAME WITH ALL MY HEART

- No ping indicator in lobby
- Laggy killers, which leads to laggy game
- Lobby dodging by killers
- Killers can see survivors rank but vice versa
- Numerous bugs, but slowly being fixed
- No form of communication between survivor. Hello, co-op survivor game???
- A decent amount of grinding needed to obtain perks
- Overpowered perks?
- Could take awhile to find a lobby with a low ping (again, ping indicator?)

Nevertheless, this is a fun game with friends (and fiends)

*1.1.0d patch
- Killers get 360-degree auto aim assist
- Killers can hit through pallets
- Adds an additional 5 meters to lunge attacks (Why devs?)

"Egy horror játék, és multiplayerben ?! Meg kell szereznem." Ezt gondoltam mielött megvettem. Mikor elsőnek inditottam el, ugynéztem ki mint egy 5 éves aki cukrot kapott. Elkeztem vele játszani, és persze victim-vel kezdtem. Első benyomásra (Körülbelül első 5-10 óra) unbalanced-nek tünt a játék. Aztán kicsit megtanultam játszani, sorban túléltem a meccseket és szereztem a pontokat. Nehéz egy játék, amíg megnem tanulsz játszani. Ami igazából nem tart sokáig, mert csak annyit kell megtanulnod hogyan kezeld a körülötted lévő dolgokat. Én nem vagyok egy profi játékos, de 10 matchből 5-6 túl élek és ez az arány csak nővekszik. Vannak benne kissebb, nagyobb fajta bug-ok. PL, folyamatosan le áll a match kereső, néha (nagyon ritkán) a gyilkos és a barátaid se tudnak felvenni a földröl, éppen a gyilkos elől futsz el és bergatsz egy fába, vagy valamibe (ez is nagyon ritka). Ezek javítva lesznek, hibák minden játékban vannak és persze hogy lesznek. Én szeretem, sőt imádom a játékot. Mint tudjuk minden rosszban van valami jó, meg persze minden jóban van valami rossz. Hibáival együtt elfogadom, és pörgetem bele az órákat :) !
игра очен хорошая покупайте не пожелеите

It's a pretty fun game so far. There's definitely some real problems with matchmaking, and as a fresh newbie there's nothing more terrifying than being run down by what you expect is a max-level Hunter. I'd recommend buying it on sale, at least until matchmaking is more reliable.
Handy tip! if you vault over a pallet with a maniac behind you, quickly duck behind a corner and crouch down. 8 times out of ten they'll go flying past you without even looking.
Those last two times are pretty horrifying though.
UPDATE:
I don't know if they patched the matchmaking or whatever, but I've been find matches easier lately.
Also, the biggest problem I've noticed is that it's easy for the Killer to camp a hooked Survivor. There's not communication, so most of the time well-meaning allies will walk in and get slaughtered. Ideally if the Killer does this the rest of the team should just rush around fixing generators, but since there's no communication it's easy to abuse this. Still a good game, but it'd be nice if something could be done to discourage this, though I don't really know what could be done.

Наиграв каких-то жалких 1000+ часов могу сказать:

-Игра стоит своих денег! И сейчас расскажу почему...

По началу вы будите всего бояться и пугаться, ничего полезного не делать и по итогу "сливать свою жопку сущности" ( т.е. вас будут убивать - а смерть это проигрыш )
Вам буду писать какой вы рак и расскажут вам про вашу семью больше того, чего вы сами о ней знаете)))

Потом вы освоите механику игры, начнете играть хорошо, не будите бояться убийцы, будите оперативно чинить генераторы, вам поступят на стенку профиля "+REP" от людей, вас будут хвалить...

Но потом вы пойдете на Твич или Ютуб и насмотритесь всяких - кмх... - высеров что несут кринж и захотите быть как они, ведь у них столько овечек что на них подписаны. Вообщем вы начнете играть как типичное "Быдло" ну или же в кругу камьюнити - "Токсики"
Купите себе яркий костюм, может даже накрутку закажете на кучу фиолетовых фонарей, будите бегать с фонарем, без самохила, творить хуйню и руинить людям катку, вам будут писать какой вы мудак и кидать репорты - но вам будет похуй ведь вы дошли финальной стадии игрока в ДбД - Токсик!
(нет, конечно, я надеюсь, вы будите благородным мансером, что держит время - водя убийцу за собой, и спасает всех фонарем... но таких сейчас мало осталось)

Вообщем, игра хорошая, но РУ-камьюнити это мрази (не всё, но на высоких рангах 70% точно)

Edit 178 hours later, and I bought in during the beta, and I still enjoy it. Fun game! Nothing quite like it.

If you like the slasher genre, horror films in general, games like Until Dawn, Evolve, L4D and Pay Day, you will enjoy this one. It has shared objectives for the 4-man team, a rewarding point system, and no pay-to-win.

Most importantly though, it's satisfying to play as the solo player (killer) AND THE FOUR-MAN TEAM! Unlike Evolve, which had mostly monster playeres, there is a good deal of strategy for the survivor team. Give it a chance, on sale if you must, but it's a fun game that won't be going anywhere anytime soon.

Pros: I don't get what the mixed reviews are all about. This game is freaking fun! *wink wink*
It is a refreshing take to the multiplayer genre. The artwork and music are immersive. The sound when the killer is coming after you is utterly terrifying and superbly implemented! 

Con: It seems too easy to get killed as the hunted. There should be more obstacles in the way between you and the killer in order to give yourself a fighting chance.

For the con, I think this can be easily patched in future updates as the devs get more feedback. I'm definitely getting this game after the demo period. Great work team! It is a sweet concept that they made to fruition. Very impressive.

i die

Amazing Concept, Poor Implementation. 

First let me state that I absolutely love the concept and gameplay design behind this game. Creating a fun game with highly asymmetric design is quite an acomplishment and this game pulls off the concept quite well. Playing as both a survivor and killer, this game is one of the most fun and intense multiplayer experiences out there, when it works.


Sadly, this game is in what I would call a beta state, not full release. Despite being a PC exclusive its performance is extremely lackluster (forcing Vsync, borderless windowed mode, and a framerate cap of 60 even on 144HZ monitors). It's also incredibly unoptomized - I run an i7 3770K, GTX 770, 16GB RAM and my rig cannot play the new asylum map above 15fps. FIFTEEN, and the graphics aren't even half as impressive as games I can run on high/ultra at 120Hz. In short, it is clear that the Devs don't have the resources to make this game what it should be. 

In addition to the performance issues, there are some incredibly broken gameplay mechanics that have continually gone unaddressed. If you face a team that all has sabotage as a killer, you're basically done. If you face a survivor that knows how to abuse so called "infinites" they're practically untouchable. If you get hooked by a killer that camps you and don't have teammates that are at a very high skill level, you're screwed. 

On top of that, the matchmaking is non-existant. You have to continously "ready up" in the hopes the game might find a lobby to match you in as a survivor. Even then, you get the wonderful experience of facing a high level top ranked killer alongside a bunch of low level rank 20 survivors and get thoroughly rekt. Alternatively you can try killer on for size and have the same occur, at rank 17 you'll be facing lobbies regularly with rank 5 and under (lower is better) survivors. 

The best thing I can say about this game is that it has incredible potential, however I fear the devs don't have the capacity or the will to bring this potential to fruition, as shown by their recent introduction of new content without addressing a fraction of the plague of bugs in the game.

I'd reccomend this game only if you are ok with playing a glitchy game and can overlook the flaws I mention above. If you're the type of person to sign up for betas and alphas and still have fun inspite of obvious problems, you'll be able to love this game. If you need a smooth experience to have fun, you'll be frustrated and quickly burn out. 

Personally, I feel like I'm in an abusive relationship with this game, it's constantly beating me down with bugs and glitches but yet I can't help but keep coming back.
It's alright

Dead by Daylight is an asymmetric 4 V 1 survival horror video game. 

The game is extremely fun to play with a small group of friends - either in it's "Kill your Friends" gamemode that allows players to face-off against eachother, with one being the killer and the rest survivors - or the "Survive With Friends" gamemode that allows you and your friends to face-off together against a random player-controlled killer.

The game still has many bugs that need to be ironed out, and still needs some balancing, but for it's low pricetag of $20, I think that it's a blast and well worth the money.

I'm so glad they decided to add a killer who literally takes half the elements of "the chase" and just completely ignores it. Oh you placed three barriers in my path? Well let me just blink through all of them. You trying to juke me by jumping back over the barriers? Well I can just blink 3 times in a row, on a 5 seconds cool down. I may be salty, but this is just pure bullshit. 

Otherwise, the only other problems with the game are its match making, its party system, and its horrible graphics options. The only way to properly edit the graphics settings is by going into the config files. You would think the devs would be smart enough to add basic things like proper graphics options, but w/e.

Great game over all and pretty fun, more so when you run into more casual types then the 'lul' I'm so good at this game type that likes to taunt you or camp/tunnel. Luckily those aren't super common to run into.

Not recommended until they fix the broken matchmaking. Also expect to tap the Join Lobby button every 5-7 seconds for 10 minutes until you find a match. Is this 1998? What the hell.

EDIT: They fixed this problem. But they put in a plethora of others. The game is fun for the first few hours but then you start to realize how insanely imbalanced it is. Do not play unless you have 3 or 4 friends to play with.
One of the best horror games I have ever played in my life!
Best mindgames in vidya. And matchmaking is fixed now, baybeeeeeee
Damned 2.0, but just as boring and horrible.

Incredibly fun for those who either love to run, or love to hunt. Being the killer is a sadistic mind's fantasy come to life. Being the survivor is a nightmare gone horribly wrong, except with the thrill of being hunted.
Fun game, a bit buggy but the developers are constantly tweeking things.
Bit repetitive at times but a pretty fun game none the less.

Avoid this game. Should have stayed in early access

-Unfair matchmaking
Constantly being match with rank 1 killers while being a rank 20 survivor and vice-versa. New players will be killed relatively fast and rank 1 survivors will run circles around new killers

-Killers camping hooked targets
With the latest patch killers are camping even more than they already are. Devs want to promote teamwork to survive but killers just camp.

-Extremely buggy game and killer favored
Devs nerf suvivors to oblivion and killers now have auto-aim making it extremely easy for killers to hit suvivors with little to no effort

-Lobby waiting simulator
Spent more time trying to get into a game than playing

-No dedicated servers
Killer is the host. If they have a poor connection you will constantly rubberband everywhere and the killer will still be able to hit and kill you

-Poorly optimized game 

No point in playing suvivors anymore since killers can teleport across pallets and hit you
